testCase.name: UpdateManagerProfile should be able to update user profile
UpdateManagerProfile should not be able to update profile from non-existing user
UpdateManagerProfile should not be able to change user email if new email already exists
UpdateManagerProfile should be able to update the password
UpdateManagerProfile should not be able to update the password without old password
UpdateManagerProfile should not be able to update the password with wrong old password
UpdateUser should be able to update a user
UpdateUser should be able to update the password
UpdateUser should be able to disable a admin if have suficient admins
UpdateUser should not be able to update a non-existing user
UpdateUser should not be able to change a user email if new email already exists
UpdateUser should not be able to disable a admin if dont have suficient admins
ResetForgotPassword should be able to reset the password
ResetForgotPassword should not be able to reset the password with non-existing token
ResetForgotPassword should not be able to reset the password with non-existing user
ResetForgotPassword should not be able to reset the password if passed more then two hours
DeleteUser should be able to delete a existing user
DeleteUser should be able to delete a admin if have suficient admins
DeleteUser should not be able to delete a non-existing user
DeleteUser should not be able to delete a admin if do not have suficient admins
AuthenticateUser should be able to authenticate
AuthenticateUser should not be able to authenticate with non existing user
AuthenticateUser should not be able to authenticate with wrong password
SendForgotPasswordEmail should be able to recover password using email
SendForgotPasswordEmail should not be able to recover a non-existing user
SendForgotPasswordEmail should generate a forgot password token
CreateUser should be able to create a new user
CreateUser should not be able to create a new user with existing email
ShowManagerProfile should be able to show manager profile
ShowManagerProfile should not be able to show manager profile from non-existing user
SignUpManager should be able to sign up
SignUpManager should not be able to sign up with existing email
ListUser should be able to list all users
